name: Big Time Basketball Dude: Slam Dunk Hoops Showdown
name_original: Big Time Basketball Dude: Slam Dunk Hoops Showdown
description:
If you live for the sound of the ball going through the net, this the game for you!

This basketball game is the perfect combination of sports, physics, and fun.

With a collection of challenging different levels this basketball game will help you fulfill your all your hoop dreams. Think you got the skill to figure out the physics on how to sink that perfect shot? Download today and find out!

Features:
* Great for Kids or Adults
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming
* Various Levels of Difficulty

Download right now!
